Translations.Text: jangnim-i geubunkke dagawa banghaeha yeossgi ttaemun-ila
geuga seuseuloleul sungyeolke halyeo haneunjileul mueos-i geudaelo hayeogeum alge haliyo
geuga gyohun-eul badgo geudaeui gyo hun-i geuleul yuighage hallyeonjido mo leunila
geuga seuseuloleul sungyeolke haji anihan geos-eun geudaeui chaeg-im-i anila
geuleona jinsillo yeolmanghayeo geudae ege dagaoneun jawa
gyeolko geulaeseoneun andoenani geu geos-i hananim-ui gyohun-igi ttaemun-ila
geuleomeulo wonhaneun ja-ege geu lo hayeogeum gyohun-eul ganjighadolog ha la
geu mueos-eulo hananim-eun ingan eul changjohasyeossneunyo
hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo ingan-eulchangjohayeo unmyeong-eul jueoss-eul ppun-ila
geuleon hu ingan-i chulsaenghagiesuntanhan gil-eul dueoss-eumyeo
geuleon da-eum-eneun ingan-eul juggehayeo mudeom-eulo hyanghadolog han hu
hananim-eun tteus-i iss-eul ttae in gan-eul dasi buhwalhasinila
sillo ingan-eun hananim-i myeonglyeonghan geosdeul-eul suhaengchi anhnola
ingan-eulo hayeogeum geuga meogneun-eumsig-eul suggohayeo boge hala
sillo hananim-eun heubjoghan bileulnaelige han hu
daejileul pyeolchyeo geugos-eulo buteosigmul-eul jaebaeke hayeo
i modeun geos-eun ingangwa gachugdeul-eul wihan geos-ila
gomag-i teojildeushan soliga deul lil ttaemyeon
geunal ingan-eun geuui hyeongjedeullo buteo dojuhanani
geunal geudeul gagjaneun tain-ege mugwansimhamyeo seuseuloui il-eman yeoljunghanola
geunal geudeul jung-ui ilbuneun eolgul-e bich-i namyeo
ilbuneun geunal geudeul-ui eolgul-i meonjilo ssayeojimyeo
saekkileul baenji yeoldal-i doen amnag taga bohobadji moshago beolyeojimyeo
yeoaga sanchaelo maejangdoeeo jilmun eul bad-euni
taoleuneun buljiog-i yeol-eul se chage balsanhamyeo
cheongug-i uiloun jadeul-ege ga kkai ogo
geuttae modeun yeonghon-eun geuga haenghangeosdeul-eul alge doenila
sillo igeos-eun gogwihan sadoga jeonhan malsseum-ila
geuneun hananim gwonjwa ap-e jul jieo seo issneun ganghanjalo
geuneun cheongmyeonghan jipyeongseon-e issneun geuleul boass-eudoe
geuga boiji anhneun yeong-yeog-e daehan jisig-eul insaeghage bolyuhago iss neun geos-i animyeo
igeos-eun jeojubad-eun satan-ui mal i animae
sillo igeos-eun man-in-eul wihan me sejiimyeo
neohui gaunde geu jinlileul wonha neun ja geugeos-eul ttaleudolog halyeo ham-i la
geuleona man-yuui junim-isin ju nim-ui tteus-i eobs-ineun neohuineun amu geos do hal su eobsnola
